mapper.update: UPDATE tb_reserve SET reserve_id = #{reserveId} WHERE reserve_id = #{reserveId};
mapper.select: SELECT l.lecture_id, l.title, l.phone_number, l.address, l.address_detail, p.name , ls.lecture_session_id, ls.session_date, r.reserve_id, r.created_at, pa.state , pa.amount, lp.img, pa.payment_kind, pa.payment_id FROM tb_reserve r LEFT JOIN tb_lecture_session ls ON r.lecture_session_id = ls.lecture_session_id LEFT JOIN tb_lecture l ON ls.lecture_id = l.lecture_id LEFT JOIN tb_lecture_photo lp ON l.lecture_id = lp.lecture_photo_id LEFT JOIN tb_person p ON l.user_id = p.user_id LEFT JOIN tb_payment pa ON r.reserve_id = pa.reserve_id WHERE r.reserve_id = #{reserveId}
